name: Secret Santa Game Jam 2020 Submission
description:
A young girl wakes up on Christmas morning, thrilled to see freshly fallen snow and keen to solve the mystery of who her Secret Santa is. Join her as she helps out her community and delves deeper into the mystery. 

This was my submission for the 2020 Secret Santa Game Jam, and the first game I've ever completed. Made with RPG Maker MZ, and using art resources from PandaMaru, and Avery from the RPG maker forums.
